<!--Python Comments -->

## Single line comment

Python Comments starts with a Number Sign (#)

```python
#This is a comment
print("Hello Python")
```



##  Python ignores string literals that are not assigned to a variable.

Example#1

```python
"""
multi line 
comments
"""
print("Hello, World!")
```

Output

```shell
Hello, World!
```



Example#2

```
str = """
multi line 
comments
"""
print("Hello, World!")
print(str)
```

```
Hello, World!

multi line 
comments
```
